snippet.title: Roguebook | Fugoro Trailer
snippet.description:
The Merchant of Wonders has found himself in the Roguebook. He'll have to work with the other heroes to escape its fiendish pages. 

Fugoro is available now as paid DLC or part of the Deluxe Edition of Roguebook, which is on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC with a Switch version coming later this year. 
-------------------------------
